description: An improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS Command vulnerability in FortiAP's console 6.4.1 through 6.4.5 and 6.2.4 through 6.2.5 may allow an authenticated attacker to execute unauthorized commands by running the kdbg CLI command with specifically crafted arguments.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: FortiAP-W2 6.2.4 through 6.2.5; FortiAP-S 6.2.4 through 6.2.5; FortiAP 6.4.1 through 6.4.5
